olympics.landing-body: Explore the route and unlock the 65 stop-cities of the Olympic Torch Relay. The more cities you unlock, the more unique codes you will get, giving you a chance to win exclusive prizes and tickets to the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
olympics.rules: Every time you unlock 10 cities, a button will appear on this homepage that will generate a specific code. Copy this code and paste it into your Coca-Cola app to enter the lottery and try to win exclusive prizes and tickets to the Paris Olympic Games.
olympics.game-wrong-guess-body: You need at least {0} points to unlock the city.
olympics.game-timeout-header: Too bad, you didn't guess in time!
olympics.completed-game-landing-page-mes: Congratulations, you have unlocked all the cities!
olympics.my-codes-description: Enter these codes in the Coca-Cola France application to win exclusive prizes and tickets to the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
olympics.paste-code-instructions: Enter this code in the Coca-Cola France application to win exclusive prizes and tickets to the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
olympics.game-finished-modal-header: You have unlocked all the cities!
olympics.game-finished-modal-body: Amazing work! You have completed the whole game.
olympics.landing-body-no-prizes: Explore the route and unlock the 65 stop-cities of the Olympic Torch Relay.
